mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `school_id` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `school_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `year_no` int DEFAULT NULL, `teacher_num` bigint DEFAULT NULL, `student_num` bigint DEFAULT NULL, `create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `update_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=139 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
